dcm-ui.position

The dcm-ui.position module sets positional info for an element to a variable

requires: jquery

Components

Example

{{thisPosition | json}} {{thisPosition2 | json}}
.container { position: relative; height: 400px; } .positionedBox { position: absolute; top: 25px; left: 25px; border: 1px dashed red; padding: 20px; } .positionedBox2 { position: absolute; top: 100px; left: 150px; border: 1px dashed red; padding: 20px; }
